data.text: @SenJackReed @BobbyScott Our schools waste a lot of money.
@SenJackReed @BobbyScott Public schools are Marxist indoctrination camps.

@SenJackReed @BobbyScott You destroyed these schools now  you want to rebuild them...You didn't come up with that under Biden. That's because everyone was to busy stealing from the Treasury on a massive scale.
@SenJackReed @BobbyScott Why didn’t you do this under the Biden administration? What held you back?
@SenJackReed @BobbyScott Modernizing and fixing up schools doesn’t stop indoctrination. give the pandering a rest
@SenJackReed @BobbyScott you’re just gonna end up having the schools send kids off to die in protests
@SenJackReed @BobbyScott Great idea but … is this another money laundering scheme?
